```go
package main 

import "fmt" 

func main() { 
   p := 3.1415926535 
   e := .5772156649 
   x := 7.2E-5 
   y := 1.616199e-35 
   z := .416833e32 

   fmt.Println(p, e, x, y, z) 
} 

```

```go
package main 
import "fmt" 

func main() { 
   a := -3.5 + 2i 
   fmt.Printf("%v\n", a) 
   fmt.Printf("%+g, %+g\n", real(a), imag(a)) 
} 

```
